price: 34. (Farao) zei tegen de gezagdragers om hem heen: “Waarlijk! Dit is inderdaad een goed onderrichte tovenaar.
arabic: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُۥٓ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَسَٰحِرٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla lil'mala-i ḥawlahu inna hādhā lasāḥirun ʿalīmun
